data.name: Evaluate
data.code:
let multiplier = parseInt(bridge.variables["pageNum-playPlaylist"])
let pageLower = multiplier * 10
let pageUpper = (multiplier * 10) + 10
let allTracks = bridge.variables["searchResults-dispText"]

allTracks.slice(pageLower, pageUpper)

data.title: play playlist
data.description:
:musical_note: Added to queue:
Added all tracks to the queue.
